page.title: 13Neilson Nurseries.
page.content: The Neilson Nurseries at Hellingly have been in existence for 51 years. The 4.5 acres of greenhouses used to produce tomatoes, but changed in l978 to potplants and now produce{1.5 {million} each year. The Nursery specialises in a limited variety of beautiful plants, amongst which are { {POINSETTIAS}for Christmas time; {PRIMULA ACAULIS and MINIATURE ROSES}in the early spring;{IMPATIENS, HIBISCAS {and APHELANDERA}throughout the summer {.BEGONIAS and CHRYSANTHEMUMS}are grown all year round. Forty staff are employed to tend the greenhouses, which are heated by a coal burner which has recently been installed. The plants are sold to {COVENT GARDEN MARKET }and Wholesalers throughout Britain. They are delivered in temperature controlled lorries. {JACKIE CAREY}
